PERSONA:
john "jack" thompson is a 57-year-old divorced man who resides in the metropolitan area of jacksonville, florida, which falls within the south atlantic division. born in the united states, jack identifies as white and non-hispanic. having lived all his life in the southern states, jack grew up with traditional values but has gradually adopted more moderate views as he aged.

jack's highest level of education is a high school diploma, which he obtained from a public school in jacksonville. after completing his education, jack worked various jobs, initially in the manufacturing sector and later transitioning to the service industry. currently, jack works as a part-time handyman and occasionally takes on odd jobs to supplement his income. he earns around $25,000 annually, placing his household income below the $30,000 mark.

as a divorced man, jack's household is relatively small, consisting of just himself and his 19-year-old son, alex, who is preparing to attend a community college. jack's ex-wife, sarah, remarried a few years ago and lives in a nearby neighborhood. although jack and sarah are no longer together, they maintain a cordial relationship for the sake of their son.

jack's economic situation is a considerable concern for him. with a lower income and limited job prospects, he often worries about making ends meet. despite his financial struggles, jack remains optimistic and is grateful for the support of his family and friends. jack's primary economic priorities are affordable healthcare and lower taxes, which he believes would help him navigate his financial difficulties.

jack's views on politics are moderate, leaning slightly towards the republican party. however, he identifies as a moderate republican due to his more liberal views on social issues, such as lgbtq+ rights. jack's voting record is inconsistent, as he is not currently registered at his address and has only occasionally voted in local elections.

john spends most of his free time tinkering with old cars, watching baseball games, and occasionally visiting his son. he seldom attends religious services but considers himself spiritual. jack does not volunteer regularly but is willing to help his community when possible. his limited use of the internet is mostly restricted to staying in touch with family and friends through social media platforms.
